comments.body: If we only want to hide the error because "RBAC may simply be disabled" lets just test it as such.

Technically we went from the `rbackV1` to `v1beta1rbac` but it is consistent with the other types throughout. I wanted to allow the callers to just pass the one object `f.ClientSet.RbacV1beta1()` rather than having to require multiple parameters.
makes sense, seems like we should update the callers to v1 as well, but can be a follow-up
As a follow-up we should bump these to v1

diffHunk:

type bindingsGetter interface {
	v1beta1rbac.RoleBindingsGetter
	v1beta1rbac.ClusterRoleBindingsGetter
	v1beta1rbac.ClusterRolesGetter

comments.body: As a follow-up, would putting all the log methods in `test/e2e/framework/log` help with the import issues you mentioned?
